business_model.rationale: Balances user acquisition through free value with conversion to premium AI capabilities - aligns with decision fatigue reduction by offering genuine free utility while premium provides advanced automation

free_tier.purpose: Demonstrate core value proposition of decision automation while creating natural upgrade motivation for advanced features

monthly_subscription.positioning: Premium automation tier competitive with productivity apps like Todoist Pro ($8/mo) but providing unique decision automation value
monthly_subscription.target_market: Busy professionals willing to pay for cognitive load reduction and time savings

annual_subscription.positioning: Significant savings for committed users, aligns with productivity app annual pricing ($60-120 range per 2026 benchmarks)

conversion_tactics: Progressive feature unlock during trial to show value over time
Day 3 and Day 10 check-ins showing automation improvements and time saved
Decision fatigue tracking showing measurable cognitive load reduction
Personalized automation success stories based on usage patterns

trigger_events: Attempt to create second decision profile
Try to access family coordination features
Request advanced AI automation after 5 basic automations
Try to access decision insights beyond basic patterns
paywall_configuration.presentation_style: Bottom sheet with clear value proposition and easy dismissal
dismissal_rules: Always dismissible with clear X button

onboarding_hooks: Show time saved calculation after first week of usage
Demonstrate decision fatigue reduction through before/after tracking
Progressive automation improvement showcasing AI learning
Personalized insights about user's decision patterns and cognitive load
progressive_feature_unlock: Basic automation → Advanced AI suggestions tease
Local storage → Cross-device sync value demonstration
social_proof_elements: Anonymous usage statistics showing time saved by similar users
Community insights about decision fatigue reduction

engagement_features: Weekly automation improvement reports showing AI learning progress
Decision pattern insights that provide meaningful self-awareness
Automation streak tracking to build habit formation
Time and mental energy saved calculations
Progressive complexity reduction as AI learns preferences better
churn_prevention: Proactive outreach when automation usage drops
Preference re-tuning suggestions when satisfaction scores decline
Alternative automation strategies when patterns change
Temporary pause option rather than immediate cancellation
winback_campaigns: "We've improved our AI" re-engagement for churned users
Special pricing for previous subscribers returning within 90 days
New feature announcements targeting previous user's specific interests
Simplified onboarding for returning users with previous preference data

target_metrics.monthly_active_users: 25,000 MAU by month 12 (productivity apps typically 15-30K MAU for successful launches)
target_metrics.trial_conversion_rate: 18% (above 2026 benchmark of 12% for premium productivity apps due to unique decision automation value)
target_metrics.monthly_churn_rate: 4% (below productivity app average of 6% due to habit formation and automation dependency)
target_metrics.projected_mrr_year_1: $45,000 MRR by month 12 (4,500 subscribers at $10 ARPU including annual subscribers)

pricing_experiments.hypothesis: Higher annual discount (40% vs 33%) increases annual conversion and reduces overall churn
pricing_experiments.test_description: A/B test $69.99 annual price against $79.99 for new subscribers
pricing_experiments.success_criteria: Increase in annual subscription percentage and 12-month LTV improvement of 15%+

pricing_experiments.hypothesis: Family pricing tier at $14.99/month increases overall revenue through multi-user households
pricing_experiments.test_description: Introduce family plan for up to 4 users as separate subscription tier
pricing_experiments.success_criteria: Family plan adoption >20% of new subscribers, ARPU increase to $12+

pricing_experiments.hypothesis: Shorter trial (7 days) with more intensive onboarding improves conversion quality
pricing_experiments.test_description: Test 7-day trial with daily check-ins vs 14-day standard trial
pricing_experiments.success_criteria: Maintain >15% conversion rate with improved 30-day retention (+10%)
